title: Engineer
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Engineer>>
<<Portrait|Engineer_happy>>
Hello, Captain.
<</Textbox>>

    <<if $Clue1Found is true and ($Clue1Owner1 is "Engineer" or $Clue1Owner2 is "Engineer")>>
        [[What do you know about $Clue1?|Engineer.Question]]
<<endif>>
<<if $Clue2Found is true and ($Clue2Owner1 is "Engineer" or $Clue2Owner2 is "Engineer")>>
    [[What do you know about $Clue2?|Engineer.Question2]]
<<endif>>
<<if $Clue3Found is true and ($Clue3Owner1 is "Engineer" or $Clue3Owner2 is "Engineer")>>
    [[What do you know about $Clue3?|Engineer.Question3]]
<<endif>>
<<if $Clue4Found is true and ($Clue4Owner1 is "Engineer" or $Clue4Owner2 is "Engineer")>>
    [[What do you know about this clue?|Engineer.Question4]]
<<endif>>


    //<<if $Clue1Found is true and ($Clue1Owner1 != "Engineer" or $Clue1Owner2 != "Engineer")>> 
//[[Engineer.Redirect]]
//<<endif>>
  //  <<if $Clue2Found is true and ($Clue2Owner1 != "Engineer" or $Clue2Owner2 != "Engineer")>> 
//[[Engineer.Redirect2]]
//<<endif>>
    //<<if $Clue3Found is true and ($Clue3Owner1 != "Engineer" or $Clue3Owner2 != "Engineer")>> 
//[[Engineer.Redirect3]]
//<<endif>>
  //  <<if $Clue4Found is true and ($Clue4Owner1 != "Engineer" or $Clue4Owner2 != "Engineer")>> 
//[[Engineer.Redirect4]]
//<<endif>>

//[[That's all.|Engineer.Bye]]

title: Engineer.Bye
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
I'll see you around.
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Engineer>>
<<Portrait|Engineer_neutral>>
Whatever.
<</Textbox>>

//End of conversation

title: Engineer.Question
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
Do you know anything about $Clue1?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Engineer>>
<<Portrait|Engineer_Neutral>>
I do believe that $Clue1 is mine, sir. If I may ask, why is it in your possession?
<</Textbox>>


[[That's all.|Engineer.Bye]]

[[I found it in $Clue1Location.|Engineer.Clue]]

[[That's none of your business.|Engineer.Upset]]

title: Engineer.Clue
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
I found it in $Clue1Location. Any ideas why?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Engineer>>
<<Portrait|Engineer_neutral>>
Why would it be in there?
<</Textbox>>

[[Why would someone would take it?|Engineer.Key]]

[[Just gonna ask questions?|Engineer.Upset]]

title: Engineer.Upset
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
Are you sure?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Engineer>>
<<Portrait|Engineer_mad>>
Are you the one who fixes this damn ship?
<</Textbox>>

<< if visited ("Engineer.Loyalty")>>
[[Engineer.Bye]]
<<endif>>

[[Engineer.Loyalty]]
//End of conversation

title: Engineer.Key
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
Any thoughts why someone would take it?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Engineer>>
<<Portrait|Engineer_neutral>>
No clue, dude.
<</Textbox>>

//Clue Key Dialogue

[[Engineer.Bye]]

title: Engineer.Loyalty
body: <<set $EngineerLoyalty to $EngineerLoyalty - 1>>

title: Engineer.Redirect
body:
[[I found this.|Engineer.RedirectClue]]

[[Nevermind.|Engineer.Bye]]

title: Engineer.RedirectClue
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
I found this $Clue1. Can you tell me anything about it?
<</Text>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Engineer>>
<<Portrait|Engineer_Neutral>>
I'm busy right now, go bother $Clue1owner1 and $Clue1Owner2 with that.
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
Sure.
<</Text>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Engineer>>
<<Portrait|Engineer_Neutral>>
Whatever.
<</Textbox>>

title: Engineer.Clue4
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
I found it in $Clue4Location. Any ideas why?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Engineer>>
<<Portrait|Engineer_Neutral>>
Is that so? I ususally keep that around just in case I'd need it. As for why it was where you found it, I do not know.
<</Textbox>>

[[What does $Clue4 do?|Engineer.Key]]

[[You're telling me half?|Engineer.Upset]]
